Original: {'Design and Display': 'The device ships with a 5.5 inch P-OLED curved display with a Full HD resolution. This display features a 700mm radius curvature and a 650mm radius curvature on the back. There is also a Gorilla Glass 3 for adding toughness to the display and ensuring that it stays intact. LG has claimed that the Corning Gorilla Glass inclusion will result in at least 20% more strength as compared to the LG G Flex. In terms of design, the G Flex 2 is very similar to the Flex 1. You have nice subtle curves with a rounded back which sits well in the palm. The phone feels a little more solid than the G Flex in general. You have the volume buttons as well as the power button on the rear of the device, just like most LG flagships now.', 'Battery and Connectivity': '4G support is one major thing missed out with the LG G Flex 2, and the device supports only one Micro SIM. LG G Flex 2 has got NFC support. To power all this we get a 3000mAh non-removable battery which does sound decent and should last through the day.'}

{'Design and Display': 'The Vivo X70 Pro Plus will reportedly feature a 6.78 inch AMOLEDdisplay with a resolution of 1440 x 3200 pixelsand a pixel density of 518ppi to deliver one of the finest viewing experiences. The display is supposed to sport a punch-hole design with very small bezels.'}

{'Cameras': 'In terms of optics, the device sports a triple camera setup on the rear consisting of a 48MP primary sensor, a 2MP secondary and another 2MP tertiary sensor. On the front it gets a 21MP shooter for selfies. It also brings in features like Artificial Intelligence,Auto Flash,Auto Focus,Bokeh Effect,Continuos Shooting,Exposure compensation,Face detection,Geo tagging,High Dynamic Range mode (HDR),ISO control,Time Lapse,Touch to focus,White balance presets. Night,Panorama,Portrait andPro Camera Modes can be visualised.', 'Performance and Battery': 'The CoolPad Cool 6 is powered by Mediatek's Helio P70, which. It is a octa-core chipset coupled with Mali-G72 MP3 GPU. The device gets 4GB of RAM and 64GB of on-board storage, which is expandable upto 256GB via microSD. It will ship with a 4000mAh battery inside.'}

{'Software and Connectivity': 'The Tecno Spark Go 2020 is expected to ship with Android 10 out of the box. Speaking of connectivity, the smartphone will reportedly have support for features such as Dual sim VoLTE (Nano + Nano), Wi-Fi 802.11, b/g/n, GPS, Radio and Bluetooth. There will also reportedly be a fingerprint sensor and the smartphone will ship with a microUSB 2.0 port. However, the device is still expected to have a 3.5mm headphone jack onboard.', 'Design and Display': 'The Tecno Spark Go 2020 will reportedly feature a 6.52 inch TFT panel tipped with a resolution of 720 x 1600 pixels. The pixel density will supposedly max out at 269ppi. The bezel-less display is further anticipated to boast a waterdrop notch design to furnish an immersive viewing experience.', 'Battery and Performance': 'The Tecno Spark Go 2020 is anticipated to be powered by MediaTek’s latest entry-level Helio A20quad-core chipset coupled with a PowerVR GE8300 GPU. That will again reportedly be paired with 2 GB RAM and an internal storage capacity of only 32 GB, which can further be expanded up to 256GB. Further, the device will reportedly pack in a 5000mAh Li-ion battery but won’t support fast charging.'}

{'Cameras': 'The I KALL K560 has a 13MP camera sensor on the back with an LED flash and features an 8MP selfie cam on the front. Features like Auto Flash, Auto Focus are supported by the device.', 'Battery and Performance': 'The I KALL K560 is embedded with a poor quad core chip. The RAM and internal storage of the device stand at 4GB and 64GB respectively. The internal storage of the device can be expanded upto 64GB through memory cards. Battery life seems pretty good with the big 4000mAh Li-ion battery that it comes with.', 'Design and Display': 'The I KALL K560 features a 6.53 inch IPS LCD display with a resolution of 720 x 1560 pixels and a pixel density of 263ppi. The display comes with a waterdrop notch and has less bezels.'}

{'Design and Display': 'The Galaxy A03 is supposed to feature a 6.5 inch IPS LCDdisplay with a resolution of 720 x 1560 pixelsand a pixel density of 264ppi. The bezel-less display will sport a infinity-V design. The smart phone has a screen to body ratio 83.04%.'}

{'Cameras': 'The I KALL K480 has an 8MP camera sensor and an LED flash on the back. For selfies, the device comes with a 5MP camera on the front.', 'Design and Display': 'The I KALL K480 features a 5.5 inch IPS LCD display with a resolution of 480 x 960 pixels and a pixel density of 195ppi. The display has less bezels and a waterdrop notch.', 'Battery and Performance': 'The I KALL K480 is embedded with a quad core chip. The RAM and internal storage of the device stand at 2GB and 16GB respectively. The device also supports memory cards upto 64GB. Battery life is the only good aspect of the device with the big 4000mAh Li-ion battery that it comes with.'}

{'Design and Display': 'Zopo Color E1 comes with 5 inch LCD touch screen IPS capacitive display, 1280 x 720 pixels screen resolution and 293.72PPI pixel density. It has a dimension of 145.9 x 71.4 x 8.5 mm and its weight is 137 grams. It is available in 5 colours including Blue, Red, White, Black and Yellow.', 'Camera and Storage': 'Zopo Color E1 is loaded with 8MP rear and 2MP front camera. Other camera features include HDR, panorama, dual LED flash, night mode, sport mode, auto focus and smile detection. Users can record full HD videos at 720p. It has an internal storage of 8GB that can be expanded up to 64GB by using a micro-SD card.'}

{'Design and Display': 'The Redmi 8A Dual is built out of plastic hence, it is not as fragile as a glass back device. It gets a 6.22 inch IPS LCD display with a screen resolution of 720x1600 pixels. A water drop notch housing the selfie shooter sits on the top of the display. The display is protected by a layer of Gorilla Glass 5. Besides this it gets a 3.5mm jack and a splash resistant body.'}

{'Battery and Performance': 'The Redmi Note 11 is said to be embedded with a MediaTek Dimensity 810 MT6833 processor and a Mali-G57 MC2GPU. The RAM and internal memory of the device could possibly be 4GB and 128GB respectively. The device couldn't support memory cards. A large 5000mAh Li-Polymer battery could come with the device. It is said to have fast charging too.', 'Design and Display': 'The Redmi Note 11 could feature a 6.6 inch IPS LCDdisplay with a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixelsand a pixel density of 399ppi. The display is said to come with a Punch-hole that has less bezels, a screen-to-body ratio of 84.97%, and an aspect ratio of 209.'}

{'Battery and Performance': 'The Apple iPhone 15 is said to be embedded with an Apple A14 Bionic chip and an Apple GPU(four-core graphics). The RAM and internal memory of the device could possibly be 8GB and 256GB respectively and the device couldn't support memory cards. A 4200mAh Li-ion battery could come with the device. That is sufficiently large to last long, thanks to the optimization. It is said to have fast charging and wireless charging too.', 'Cameras': 'The Apple iPhone 15 is said to come with a dual-camera system on the back with a 12MP primary camera sensor, a 12MP wide-angle sensor, and an LED flash. On the front, the device will probably get a 12MP selfie cam. AF Phase Detection, Auto Flash, Auto Focus, Bokeh Effect, Continuos Shooting, Exposure compensation, Face detection, Geo-tagging, High Dynamic Range mode (HDR), ISO control, Optical image stabilization, Touch to focus, White balance presets could be the features supported.', 'Design and Display': 'The Apple iPhone 15 could feature a 6.1 inch OLEDdisplay with a resolution of 1170 x 2532 pixelsand a pixel density of 457ppi. the device could come with a notch display design.'}

{'Software and Connectivity': 'I KALL Z2 comes with Android 8 out of the box. The smartphone gets connectivity options like dual sim , Wi-Fi 802.11, b/g/n, GPS, and Bluetooth. In terms of ports selection, the smartphone gets a 3.5mm headphone jack and a microUSB port.', 'Battery and Performance': 'The I KALL Z2 is embedded with a Quad core processor and a Mali-G52GPU. The RAM and internal memory of the device is 4GB and 32GB respectively. The device supports memory cards upto 32GB. A large 4000mAh Li-ion battery comes with the device.', 'Design and Display': 'The I KALL Z2 features a 6.26 inch TFTdisplay with a resolution of 480 x 960 pixelsand a pixel density of 171ppi. The display comes with a notch display.'}

{'Design and Display': 'The I KALL Z1 features a 5.45 inch TFTdisplay with a resolution of 480 x 960 pixelsand a pixel density of 197ppi. The display comes with a notch display.', 'Cameras': 'The I KALL Z1 comes with a 8MP rear sensor, and an LED flash. On the front, The device gets a 5MP selfie cam.'}

{'Software and Connectivity': 'I KALL K540 comes with the years old Android 6 out of the box. The smartphone has connectivity options like dual SIM 4G, Wi-Fi 802.11, b/g/n, GPS, and Bluetooth. In terms of ports selection, the device gets a microUSB port and a 3.5mm headphone jack .', 'Design and Display': 'The I KALL K540 features a 5.5 inch IPS LCD display with a resolution of 480 x 1014 pixels and a pixel density of 204ppi. The display has a waterdrop notch with less bezels.'}

{'Design and Display': 'With a 2.4-inch TFT display that has a 320 x 240 pixel density, the phone is backlit to enable easy operation even in the dark. Its numerical keypad functions very smoothly and it looks elegant.', 'Software and Platform': 'Micromax Bharat 1 is a feature phone that runs KaiOS and offers WhatsApp and YouTube support.'}

Main Camera.Description: Triple camera setup with a 48MP main sensor, supplemented by two 2MP cameras. Features include AI, Auto Flash, Auto Focus, Bokeh Effect, Continuous Shooting, Exposure Compensation, Face Detection, Geo Tagging, HDR, ISO Control, Time Lapse, Touch to Focus, and White Balance Presets.

Front Camera.Description: 21MP f/2.0 single front camera with AI and Bokeh Effect.

Performance.Description: Powered by a MediaTek Helio P70 chipset with a 4x 2.1GHz Cortex-A73 and 4x 2GHz Cortex-A53 CPU configuration and Mali-G72 MP3 GPU.  4GB of RAM and 64GB of internal storage are included, expandable via microSD.
Weaknesses: Mid-range processor may struggle with demanding games or apps

Software and Connectivity.Connectivity: 4G VoLTE, Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Bluetooth 4.2, GPS (with A-GPS and Glonass), FM Radio, microUSB 2.0 port,  Dual SIM (Nano)

Design and Display.Display: 6.52-inch TFT display with 720 x 1600 pixels resolution (269 ppi)
Design and Display.Design: Waterdrop notch, Dimensions: 165.6mm x 76.3mm x 9.1mm, Weight: 193g

Battery and Performance.Processor: MediaTek Helio A20 with PowerVR GE8300 GPU

Main Camera.Description: Single 13 MP main camera with LED flash, Auto Flash, and Auto Focus.  Features digital zoom.
